languages.text: "Вы следуете опасной тропой, что ведет за вуаль. Для борьбы с силами, которые невозможно приручить. Какие бы распри не одолевали твой род... его судьба незавидна".
"You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."
languages.original_text: "Вы следуете опасной тропой, что ведет за вуаль. Для борьбы с силами, которые невозможно приручить. Какие бы распри не одолевали твой род... его судьба незавидна".

traits.locale_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."
"You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."
"You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."
"You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."

languages.text: “你们选择了一条危险的道路。你们直通面纱的另外一端，去挑战那不可驯服的力量。无论你的族人间有什么纷争……他们的命运都不会令人羡慕。”
languages.original_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."

traits.locale_text: “你们选择了一条危险的道路。你们直通面纱的另外一端，去挑战那不可驯服的力量。无论你的族人间有什么纷争……他们的命运都不会令人羡慕。”

languages.text: « La voie que vous empruntez, bien que périlleuse, mène au-delà du voile. Vous devrez y affronter des forces indomptables. Quels que soient les conflits qui opposent vos semblables... leur destin est peu enviable. »
languages.original_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."

traits.locale_text: « La voie que vous empruntez, bien que périlleuse, mène au-delà du voile. Vous devrez y affronter des forces indomptables. Quels que soient les conflits qui opposent vos semblables... leur destin est peu enviable. »

languages.text: «Recorres un camino peligroso que lleva más allá del velo. Te enfrentas a fuerzas que no se pueden domar. Sea cual sea la lucha que espera a tus congéneres... no envidio su destino».
languages.original_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."

traits.locale_text: «Recorres un camino peligroso que lleva más allá del velo. Te enfrentas a fuerzas que no se pueden domar. Sea cual sea la lucha que espera a tus congéneres... no envidio su destino».

languages.text: 「あなたの進む危険な道は、ヴェールの向こうに繋がっている。使いこなせない力と闘う道だ。キンがどんな争いにさらされようと…彼らの運命は羨むようなものではない」
languages.original_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの進む危険な道は、ヴェールの向こうに繋がっている。使いこなせない力と闘う道だ。キンがどんな争いにさらされようと…彼らの運命は羨むようなものではない」

languages.text: "Ihr beschreitet einen gefährlichen Pfad, der hinter den Schleier führt. Um gegen Kräfte zu kämpfen, die sich nicht zähmen lassen. Welcher Unfriede Euer Volk auch plagen mag ... ihr Schicksal ist nicht beneidenswert."
languages.original_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr beschreitet einen gefährlichen Pfad, der hinter den Schleier führt. Um gegen Kräfte zu kämpfen, die sich nicht zähmen lassen. Welcher Unfriede Euer Volk auch plagen mag ... ihr Schicksal ist nicht beneidenswert."

languages.original_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."

languages.text: "Örtünün ötesine uzanan tehlikeli bir yoldasın. Uslanmayacak güçlerle savaştasın. Soydaşların neyle baş edecek olursa olsun... Kaderlerinde acı yatıyor."
languages.original_text: "You tread a perilous path that leads beyond the veil. To fight forces that cannot be tamed. Whatever strife may plague your kin... their fate is unenviable."
